programmes.title: Kids Programmes
programmes.description: Programs for children to build foundational life and hygiene skills, creativity and early digital skills.

courses.title: ZombieGerm - Children's Hygiene
courses.description: Fun, child-friendly resources teaching handwashing and basic hygiene using stories, posters and activities.

courses.title: Basic Infection Control for Children
courses.description: An introduction for children and carers about germs, sneezing etiquette and basic infection control.

courses.title: Creative Arts for Kids
courses.description: Drawing, painting and crafts to build motor skills and creativity in young learners.

courses.title: Intro to Scratch Programming (Kids)
courses.description: Beginner coding using Scratch — sequencing, loops and logic for kids aged 7–12.

programmes.title: Short Courses
programmes.description: Short, focused courses delivering practical skills and compliance knowledge — ideal for CPD and refreshers.

courses.title: Allergens Awareness (Short Course)
courses.description: Practical training on the 14 major allergens, labelling and preventing cross-contamination for catering staff.

courses.title: Fire Safety Essentials (Short)
courses.description: Key fire safety awareness for staff: identifying risks, using extinguishers, evacuation procedures.

courses.title: First Aid Basics (Short Course)
courses.description: Core first aid actions for workplace incidents: CPR awareness, treating burns, cuts and fractures.

courses.title: Customer Service Essentials (Short)
courses.description: Key customer service skills for front-line staff — communication, complaint handling and upselling basics.

courses.title: Retail Essentials (Short Course)
courses.description: Basic retail skills: till operations, stock handling, visual merchandising basics.

courses.title: Infection Control Awareness (Short)
courses.description: Practical infection control skills for workplace prevention and standard precautions.

courses.title: Substance Awareness (Short)
courses.description: Awareness course covering substance misuse signs, workplace policy and support routes.

programmes.title: Certificate Programmes
programmes.description: Regulated certificate programmes for entry to career pathways and role-specific competencies.

courses.title: Customer Service Level 1 Certificate
courses.description: Entry-level customer service qualification focused on basic service skills and communication.

courses.title: Functional Skills – English Level 1
courses.description: Certificate covering English reading, writing and communication at Level 1.

courses.title: Health & Social Care - Certificate Level 2
courses.description: Foundational knowledge for support workers — safe practice, communication & person-centred care.

courses.title: Safeguarding Children – Certificate
courses.description: Certificate-level training to ensure staff understand child protection, reporting and safer working practices.

courses.title: Digital Skills Certificate – Level 1
courses.description: Fundamental digital skills for workplace productivity: email, documents and basic spreadsheets.

courses.title: Functional Skills – Maths Level 1
courses.description: Certificate-level maths focusing on everyday numeracy and workplace calculations.

programmes.title: Diploma Programmes
programmes.description: Diploma-level programmes providing occupational skills and deeper technical knowledge for career progression.

courses.title: Diploma in Health & Social Care (Level 3)
courses.description: Comprehensive diploma covering complex care needs, safeguarding, and leadership at team level.

courses.title: Children & Young People's Workforce Diploma
courses.description: Diploma for practitioners working with children, including safeguarding, development and curriculum support.

courses.title: Diploma in Business Administration (Level 3)
courses.description: Practical diploma covering administration, business processes, digital record management and team coordination.

courses.title: Logistics & Warehousing Diploma
courses.description: Operational diploma covering warehousing, inventory control, health & safety in logistics environments.

courses.title: Hospitality & Catering Diploma (Level 2)
courses.description: Practical skills and knowledge for food preparation, front-of-house service and hygiene at Level 2 diploma standard.

courses.title: Performing Manufacturing Operations (Diploma)
courses.description: Diploma module set for manufacturing roles covering production processes and quality checks.

programmes.title: Higher Diploma Programmes
programmes.description: Higher diplomas for advanced vocational knowledge, supervisory skills and technical management.

courses.title: HACCP Level 4
courses.description: Advanced HACCP principles, system implementation and verification for food manufacturing supervision.

courses.title: Food Safety & Hygiene Level 4
courses.description: Advanced food safety for managers covering systems, microbiology and regulation.

courses.title: Leadership & Management Higher Diploma
courses.description: Advanced leadership skills for managerial roles covering performance management and strategic planning.

courses.title: Internal Quality Assurance (IQA)
courses.description: Higher diploma level training for internal quality assurance practitioners and verifiers.

programmes.title: Top Up Degree Courses
programmes.description: Top-up degree modules allowing progression from diploma to honours degree with focused subjects.

courses.title: Top-up Degree: Logistics Management
courses.description: Advanced logistics topics suitable for top-up degree progression — supply chain design, transport planning and optimisation.

courses.title: Top-up Degree: Environmental Conservation (Advanced)
courses.description: Advanced study in conservation policy, habitat management and project planning for degree progression.

courses.title: Top-up Degree: Advanced Health & Social Care
courses.description: Top-up modules focusing on advanced policy, research methods and leadership in health and social care.

programmes.title: Masters Programmes
programmes.description: Advanced professional and academic masters-level programmes for leadership roles and specialist practice.

courses.title: Masters: Security Management
courses.description: Masters-level pathway in security management covering strategy, risk assessment and countermeasures.
courses.certification: Master of Professional Security (subject to validation)

courses.title: Masters: Auditing & Inspection Leadership
courses.description: High-level masters module for designing and leading audit programmes across organisations.

courses.title: Masters: Strategic Leadership
courses.description: Masters module focused on strategy, research, organisational change and policy leadership.
